name: Island (itch) (Effigy13)
description:
Getting shipwrecked was bad and the raft was not the most stable. But they had all heard chanting on the island nearby. You can’t be sure what took the boat down as the water had been calm, but you just need to get to the island, and you will find help. But what is that under the water? Small and dark? Getting closer?

(Use the arrow keys or A and D to move. Try not fall into the water or touch the creatures...)

Design

Frederika and Francesca

Programming

Frederika

Art

Francesca
